sections.paragraph: மீளு, சுதந்தரமாயிரு. தப்புவி, பழிவாங்கு, வழிவாங்குகிறவன், உறவினனாயிரு, சுதந்தரவாளி - வினைச்சொல்
to redeem, to act as kinsman- redeemer, to avenge, to revenge, to ransom, to do the part of a kinsman
1) to act as kinsman, to do the part of next of kin, to act as kinsman-redeemer; by marrying brother's widow to beget a child for him, to redeem from slavery, to redeem land, to exactvengeance
Cognate: H1350, H1353, H3008
